attributes.action: Create a petition for an English Parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
In 1998 three devolution Acts passed by the United Kingdom Parliament; these were separate Acts for Northern Ireland, Scotland and Wales.  

There was no devolution Act for England.
attributes.background: This petition calls for citizens England to be given a ‘devolved government’ and thus be given similar political rights as those given to the citizens of Northern Ireland, Scotland and Wales.
